name: Do You Know What You Want
content: 有那么一个人 对你无微不至
Stay with you day and night
每日每夜 待在你身边
I can tell that's what you need
I know just what to do
I'll take good care of you
Baby you can get that from me
宝贝儿 你能得到我所有的爱
Every time you look at me
我知道 她对你并不好
So which one will you choose
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
宝贝儿 你是否明白
Next one you are all over her
You know I'll stay on track
How can I help you to make up your mind
我如何才能帮你下定决心
Boy you're running out of time
男孩儿 别犹豫不决了
So which one will you choose
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
请呼唤我的名字 告诉我
Every time you look at me
我知道 她对你并不好
So which one will you choose
How can I help you to make up your mind
我如何才能帮你下定决心
Boy you're running out of time
男孩儿 别犹豫不决了
So which one will you choose
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
Do you know what you want
你是否知道你想要什么
